Text:
Hey! There is another release posted here
by RELOADED. Are these 2, both the same?
This one is released in Aust and NZ and is suppose to have Exclusive Weapons Pack DLC and In-game character skins DLC. Dunno if it has though.

For All those who have the Crash prob after a few minutes. Open the game go to option->Online and change the INTERNET tab to LAN... The crash occur upon the checkpoints (the game try to reach the online server) ! sorry for my bad english i hope this work for you ;P

This wont install for me, it either does nothing or it says it did not install correctly, is there something Im missing that is not included?  Also Avast is being a bitch about this but I disabled it and it still wont work, no firewall either, any help will be appreciated.

3DM crack v1 seems not to save game progress. And 3DM crack (as the Reloaded crack) gives me "0xc0000142" launch error.
Windows Xp 32bit sp3 here. Any solution?
